name: CLICK JETMAN
description:
CLICK JETMAN

Guide the JETMAN around the sky and try to survive as long as possible.

Survive in the sky and avoid the rocks. 

Made as a learning project in godot engine

HOW TO PLAY

  • Hold left mouse button and move anywhere on screen, the JETMAN will follow it
  • Rest on the platforms that spawn periodically 
  • Avoid hitting the rocks as they do health damage
  • Health and Fuel pickups will spawn randomly to help you survive
  • Game over if you fall , run out of fuel or health
